question:
Which among the following tools can be used to establish paternity of a child?
1. ABO blood group typing
2. Polymerase chain reaction (PCR)
3. DNA Fingerprinting
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: All the three viz. ABO blood group typing; Polymerase chain reaction (PCR)as well as DNA Fingerprinting can be used to establish the paternity of a child.
